snippet: The three men, and a fourth who received a life sentence, were convicted of trying to blow up a commercial airliner in June.
abstract: Chinese court sentences to death three ethnic-Uighur men convicted of trying to blow up airliner in what state news media described as act of religious-inspired extremism.
lead_paragraph: The three men, and a fourth who received a life sentence, were convicted of trying to blow up a commercial airliner in June.

headline.seo: Chinese Court Sentences 3 Uighurs to Death
headline.main: Chinese Court Sentences 3 Uighurs to Death
headline.print_headline:
China: Men Sentenced to Death
In Plot to Blow Up an Airliner
